name: WhoseTurn
0:
”Alexa, open Whose Turn”
”Alexa, ask Whose Turn who should take out the trash”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: whose turn
des: Need to decide whose turn it is pick something or perform a task? Ask Alexa for help. If you're trying to decide whose turn it is to pick a movie on movie night, Alexa can randomly select an attribute from the list in this skill. Example attributes include "the youngest person" and "the person wearing the most jewelry." Or if you're trying to decide who should take out the trash, Alexa can help with that too!
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
